programme.title: 7 Little Johnstons
programme.desc: The Johnstons hit the beach for a vacation in Florida with family and friends, including the kids' significant others. Jonah breaks the news that he's moving out to live with his girlfriend, Ashley.

programme.title: 7 Little Johnstons
programme.desc: Trent begins searching for a new job while Amber decides whether or not to enroll in college to continue her career as a teacher. Anna, Emma and Alex set up Emma's new photo booth and take snapshots for their online shops.

programme.title: I Am Jazz
programme.desc: Jazz's rally for Black Trans Lives is in jeopardy after her main speaker drops out. Sander goes on a second date with Hope and is surprised to learn about some of her dating criteria. Jazz confronts TS Madison about her comments on Jazz's mental health.

programme.title: 7 Little Johnstons
programme.desc: The Johnstons have a lot to celebrate between Mother's Day, Liz and Brice's second anniversary, and Anna finally moving out on her own.

programme.title: Sister Wives
programme.desc: Christine questions why a nanny is allowed around Robyn's kids when her family is not, so Kody produces a long list of COVID rules that the nanny follows. Janelle thinks some of it is ridiculous, but the wives wonder why they didn't get this list sooner.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Lisa tackles the challenging mystery of why a woman was abandoned in a trash can as a baby. Unexpected DNA results throw a woman's entire identity into question - but no one is prepared for the shocking details Chris unearths about the day she was born.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Chris unwraps the mystery of a woman's origins, which began with her being abandoned at a Korean orphanage. A lover's violent death and the forced adoption of their newborn, has Lisa desperately searching for a woman's only child, hoping it will heal her.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Samantha's already shopped at 100 different bridal stores without ever finding the right dress and her bullying mom is not helping. Last Minute Lia, on the other hand, has never tried a single gown and has to leave with one today.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.sub-title: Randy Will Show You The Door
programme.desc: Bridal model Jessica is depending on her feisty friends to help her make a decision, but when they get out of control Randy has to step in. New mom Marlo is back with her outspoken twin Margo and hopes she can keep her brutally honest comments in check.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Mariah is looking for a princess dress and wants dog Coco to match. Jami is eloping to Paris and needs a dress as magical as her destination. After losing everything in an apartment fire, Brittany and Justin reach out to George to help save their wedding.

programme.title: Four Weddings
programme.desc: RhiAnna has a horse and carriage entrance, while Lisa sees the results of a year's worth of meticulous planning.

programme.title: Four Weddings
programme.desc: Firecrackers amaze the crowd at Diana's travel themed wedding, while Melea's theme highlights her road trip romance. Thunder and lightning give light to Nicole's purple nuptials while Leila sparkles with rhinestones and a bar made of ice.

programme.title: Four Weddings
programme.desc: Kathryn's wedding is at an art house movie theatre and Heidi's guests celebrate her day at a glass-covered garden.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Ashley lost over 200 lbs. in Houston, but struggles to regain independence and continue to lose back in California with her family of enablers. No longer a shut-in, Diana has embraced her new life and shed 300 lbs but has ongoing knee damage.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Liz has gone from being bedbound with lymphedemas on both legs, to standing and walking, but old fears are about to threaten her progress. If Jenn and Marissa can't get along as mother and daughter to lose weight, they'll have to proceed apart.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.sub-title: Maja and Justin: Where Are They Now?
programme.desc: Maja needs weight-loss surgery so she can lose weight, but Dr. Now won't approve her for surgery if she can't overcome getting dumped by her boyfriend Christian without using food to cope. Justin charts a course to be one of Dr. Now's best patients ever.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life: Where Are They Now?
programme.desc: Zsalynn is excited for a fresh start, but her 360-body lift at a Beverly Hills clinic proves more challenging than expected. Lonely and depressed since her gastric surgery, Olivia wants skin removal surgery but struggles to lose the weight to qualify.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life: Where Are They Now?
programme.desc: Laura has lost more than 300 pounds and is much less dependent on her husband Joey, who now is having trouble finding his way in the relationship. Marla, one of Dr. Now's most challenging patients, returns and the fireworks begin all over again.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Living on a homestead with his family, Lucas wants to spread his wings and fly, but at 600 pounds, he can't take off. All he does is eat and game, and if he wants to leave the nest and live a normal life, he needs Dr. Now's help to lose over 400 pounds.

programme.title: Too Large
programme.desc: Jasmin is a young single mom who weighs 604 pounds and has lost almost all of her independence. Her mother was recently diagnosed with MS, and Jasmin knows that she must get bariatric surgery so she can take care of her mom and her 7-year-old son.

programme.title: Save My Skin
programme.desc: Rae worries that a strange growth on his back might bleed out while he sleeps, Sophie's eczema drives her crazy, Connor has a lump on his forehead that has stunted his social life, and Vicki's lipoma makes her self-conscious during her DJ performances.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Identical twins enlist Lisa's help to unlock the mystery of why they were placed for adoption. Chris hopes to fulfill the wishes of a deceased father by tracking down the first-born son he and his wife placed for adoption when they were young lovers.

programme.title: Long Lost Family
programme.desc: Lisa hopes that locating a man's biological mother will finally allow him to overcome his lifelong struggle with abandonment. Chris is tasked with locating a woman's only child and delivering the difficult details of her daughter's birth story.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction
programme.desc: Crystal has been eating household cleanser every day since she was twelve. Samantha tans up to three times daily.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction
programme.desc: Tempestt eats detergent up to seven times a day, as well as the soap she eats in the shower. Jeff is addicted to strongman competitions and trains up to six hours a day.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction
programme.desc: Lauren used to be addicted to drugs and alcohol, but now she's addicted to extreme bodybuilding. Rhonda, 24, can't stop sucking her thumb.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction
programme.desc: Rebecca is addicted to shoes owning over 200 pairs. Haley has been pulling her hair up to three hours daily for over six years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction
programme.desc: Lauren can't go to a social event without wearing her fur suit. Adele has been eating couch cushions for twenty years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction
programme.desc: April's addiction to her puppets has gotten so strong she can't go anywhere without them, practicing up to 12 hours a day. Meanwhile, Debbie is severely allergic to cats, but has over twenty of them, leaving her in isolation from the outside world.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: At over 700 pounds, Teretha's life is confined to a bed, which is a far cry from her former job representing Detroit's healthy eating program. Her adoring family fears losing her, and hopes a gastric bypass is the solution she needs to save her life.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: Liz is completely bed bound with severe lymphedema that makes it impossible to walk. Utterly isolated, with no friends, she battles depression, and lives with her mom who is too ill to take care of her. Liz desperately wants to become mobile.

programme.title: Born With Albinism
programme.desc: Jon and Liz have five adopted children from China. Four of them have albinism, a rare disorder that reduces pigment in the skin and hinders vision. Having children with disabilities can be challenging, but the Grabowskis are considering adopting again.

programme.title: Conjoined Twins: Inseparable
programme.desc: Carmen and Lupita are conjoined twins with distinct personalities sharing not only their body but also every moment of their young adult lives. They face challenges as they fight for their independence and prepare to tackle college life away from home.

programme.title: Extraordinary People
programme.desc: Ari and Caitlin and Myles and Precious experience the joy of a transgender pregnancy when Ari and Myles, the men in their relationships, become pregnant. The couples must conquer unique obstacles when the person carrying and birthing their child is a man.

programme.title: The 685-lb Teen
programme.desc: Justin Williamson is a teenager who weighs 670 lbs and is chasing his musical dreams while fighting for his life. Faced with death or surgery, Justin must transform.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Four months after surgery, Amy's pregnant! Her doctor warns it's going to be a difficult pregnancy. Tammy's weight soars, even with Chris joining her weight loss journey. Jerry, Tammy's long-distance boyfriend, visits, but Amy doubts his motives.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: With her weight spiraling, Tammy makes a life-altering decision. Amy finally gets a taste of the life she's always wanted, but, unfortunately, it's short-lived. An emergency surgery has repercussions for Chris.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Tammy is back from rehab, and Amy kisses her freedom goodbye as she comes to a drastic decision regarding her sister. With his bariatric surgery on the line, Chris tries to shed the weight he's gained but is shocked when he and Tammy step on the scale.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Amy is upset that Tammy's new nurse isn't pushing her enough. Tammy has started slacking, and the family worries about what could be the cause. Chris and Tammy clash when he confronts her about the new man in her life.

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: For James B, food means family. He grew up eating rich Haitian food and loves it with a passion. Now, James needs Dr. Now's help to diminish that love in order to survive, but a death in the family sends James retreating back to the comforts he knows.

programme.title: 1000-lb Sisters
programme.desc: Chris faces the ultimate weigh-in to get approved for bariatric surgery. With Tammy's weight at a standstill, Amy and Michael make a life-altering decision. The family's fears about Tammy's choice in partners are realized.

programme.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
programme.desc: Joanne's hoarding is so extreme that the city has already sent her to jail four times.

programme.title: Long Lost Family

programme.title: Long Lost Family

programme.title: Four Weddings
programme.desc: Ali's beach wedding becomes a black light rave and Renee's vows go from heartfelt to funny.

programme.title: Four Weddings
programme.desc: Shannon's wedding becomes a vintage affair because of her love of antique keys; Sarah's BBQ hoedown starts at the watering hole.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: Dress shopping just got hot with 'Iron Chef's' Cat Cora and her fiancée, Nicole. Rain needs a dress that will fit inside one of Coney Island's scariest rides. George helps Stephanie and Adel get into shape for their big day.

programme.title: Say Yes to the Dress
programme.desc: It's a star studded premiere as Jenna and Val from "Dancing With the Stars" waltz into Kleinfeld to find her dream dress. WWE Hall of Famer Mick Foley steps out of the ring to help his friend Heather find a last minute dress after hers is ruined.

programme.title: Darcey & Stacey
programme.desc: Darcey and Stacey set sail in Turkey's Twin Bays. Stacey reveals a secret she's been hiding from her sister. Georgi attempts to lift his spirits in an unusual way. Stacey and Florian get news that alters their future.

programme.title: Darcey & Stacey
programme.desc: The twins travel to Istanbul for the final phase of their transformation. Stacey tells Darcey shocking information. Then, Darcey makes a decision that changes everything.

programme.title: Darcey & Stacey
programme.sub-title: Over the Drama and Under the Knife
programme.desc: Darcey struggles to move on from her relationship. Georgi confronts an enemy from his past. After lengthy and challenging surgeries, the twins return home to reveal their new looks.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days
programme.desc: Gino packs for his trip to Panama to meet Jasmine. Memphis is ready to marry a Tunisian man she's never met before. Caleb and Alina prepare to meet after 13 years. Kim plans to fly across the world for her last shot at love with Usman.

programme.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days
programme.sub-title: Pillow Talk: A Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Your 90 Day favourites invite you into their homes as they watch the season premiere of 'Before the 90 Days!' Tim and Veronica, Loren and Alexei, Jovi and Yara, and Angela and Skyla are watching along, and no one is holding back!

programme.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days
programme.desc: Jasmine's jealousy rears its head. Memphis has a secret about her ex. Alina worries that Caleb doesn't understand her abilities. Usman's friends do not support his relationship with Kim. Mike's friends believe Ximena is using him.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Warden Tommy Johnson pays a surprise visit to the home of a known poacher. Warden Mike Boone relocates an alligator snapping turtle.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: On the Gulf, hundreds of sea turtles face death during a cold spell. A tip leads to a raid on a deer poacher in central Texas. Wardens crack down on white-tailed deer hunters throughout the state, but in Southwest Texas, mule deer season is in full swing.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens investigate an illegal deer hunting case that becomes the largest deer poaching case in Texas history.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens stay busy patrolling all over the state of Texas. On Lake Sam Rayburn, a water patrol turns into a cry for help. The wardens serve a warrant to a man who illegally shot a hog. A drug arrest leads a game warden into a manhunt.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: It's opening weekend of deer season and the wardens head out around the state to ensure everyone plays by the rules. In East Texas, an injured owl is rushed to the vet. On the Gulf, Game Wardens get tough when an oysterman's catch doesn't add up.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: The wardens are deep into deer season, investigating a suspected poacher and a felon who shouldn't be using a firearm to hunt. An alligator and her hatchlings must be captured and relocated from a school.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Wardens relocate a large herd of pronghorn to restore populations in West Texas, investigate the killing of a protected rattlesnake, and wrangle a loose bull. Game Wardens check hunting camps to ensure no one's taking too many white-tail deer.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Wardens see plenty of violations at night, from road hunters to felons possessing firearms. Game Wardens stop wildlife crimes with anonymous tips about anglers keeping over the limit and a specially trained k-9 unit to sniff out illegal items.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Wardens search for an endangered Whooping Crane. A local beauty shop owner finds an injured baby hawk. Wardens respond to a call about a nuisance alligator and suspicions of a deer poacher arise.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Summer has Game Wardens Chelsea and Ben rushing to a call about a capsized canoe. Game Warden Deschaaf investigates a trapped deer that leads to more questions than answers. At Canyon Lake, Game Wardens assist in the arrest of a man with a warrant.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In Texas, a new year brings new cadets and a rookie almost gets run down. In Beaumont, Game Warden Boone investigates an armed trespasser. Game Wardens encounter a Mexican boat on U.S. waters while looking for illegal gill nets on the Rio Grande.

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A hot summer weekend in Texas keeps wardens busy on the water. A festival attracts thousands of people to float the San Marcos River. Patrol on Lake Texoma leads to multiple arrests. A fisherman is questioned when he can't provide identification.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game wardens attempt to catch a running deer before it hurts itself. The wardens investigate an impersonation case in which a man claims to be one of their own. While patrolling Lake Tawakoni, Richards comes across a suspicious group.

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In Liberty County, the death of a deer is investigated. Fawns in Harris County are being illegally kept as pets. Patrol on Somerville Lake leads to multiple citations. A suspicious car is stopped in Red River County.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A deer poacher is busted, a baby rattlesnake is rescued, a hummingbird evades capture, and a raccoon is released into the wild. The game wardens also respond to flooding conditions and a car accident.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A landowner is spoken to for a second time about illegally hunting dove over bait. An injured deer is found hiding in a shed after being attacked. While pulling over a suspicious vehicle, the game wardens notice the driver hiding something under his seat.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game warden Eddins assists the local police with an animal cruelty case. Game warden Richards responds to a trespassing dispute, and Game warden Roraback relocates a snapping turtle. On the coast, Game warden Bailey cracks down on fishermen.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In El Paso County, teal season has just begun. An injured hog needs help in Hardin County. Galveston County fishermen are not playing by the rules. A suspicious driver is searched in Chambers County. Turtle hatchlings are released on South Padre Island.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Anglers are out all over Texas. In Houston County, a Game Warden returns after a life-threatening injury. Along the coast, fishermen get caught with too many sharks. A protected turtle gets relocated and anglers on the Gulf learn how to tag fish.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A hunter is confronted for killing a deer with a gun in bowhunting only season. A man is questioned for being in possession of venomous copperhead snakes. While checking bowhunters at night, a game warden helps find an injured hunter.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: It's the opening of deer and oyster season in Texas. On the Gulf, Game Wardens find illegal undersized oysters. In East Texas, Game Wardens patrol deer camps. An owl is rescued from a chicken coop and set free.

programme.desc: Across Texas, the wardens enforce the law during prime deer season. Bad weather conditions lead to a serious car wreck. A tipster reports an injured owl. A hunter harassment issue between neighbors is addressed. Illegal deer disposals are investigated.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: On the Gulf, oyster boats and fish retailers are inspected. Outside San Antonio, a poacher is caught after posting pictures. In East Texas, Game Wardens patrol deer camps and help a pelican in distress.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In a special episode, game wardens catch those violating the laws of Texas. From keeping deer tied up to selling protected species to illegally hunted alligators, the Texas game wardens are there to serve justice.

programme.desc: Across Texas, game wardens work day and night to enforce the law. In East Texas, a young woman is served an arrest warrant. A fisherman has no fishing license but plenty of outstanding warrants. Outside Austin, someone illegally dumps a pile of trash.

programme.desc: Inman and Eddins assist on a manhunt when a suspect runs a constable off the road. An ordinary fishing check in Navarro County leads Amundson to illegal activity. In Jasper County, game wardens patrol an area after receiving trespassing complaints.

programme.desc: Game Warden Eddins helps a neighbour in need. Reneau responds to a call about a baby red-tailed hawk. Game Warden Richards attempts to serve an arrest warrant. Game Warden Startz patrols solo on the Guadalupe River. Wardens monitor the Rio Grande.

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: Lone Star Law

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In a special episode, Game Warden Richards investigates some belligerent campers using public lands as their personal toilet. Game Warden Jones has his patience tested by an intoxicated boater. Game Wardens Bailey and Bailey serve a warrant.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch: Bloodline
programme.desc: With the Cornelia Marie as their mothership, Josh, Casey and Jeff cast lines into Hawaii's most productive offshore fishing spot. When ocean currents dash hopes of a quick bounty, they must apply lessons from the Bering Sea to land the elusive ahi horde.

programme.desc: In the season 2 finale, thousands of pounds short of their promised catch, Josh, Casey and Jeff steer the Cornelia Marie toward Kona, banking that the family they've built in Hawaii can help turn the tide to fulfilling the dream Phil Harris left behind.

programme.desc: In the season 2 finale, thousands of pounds short of their promised catch, Josh, Casey and Jeff steer the Cornelia Marie toward Kona, banking that the family they've built in Hawaii can help turn the tide to fulfilling the dream Phil Harris left behind.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: It's snapper season on the Gulf, and as fishermen catch fish, game wardens catch fishermen who are breaking the law. Two men are investigated for cruelty to a wild pig, a jet ski collision leads to arguments, and an exotic tortoise finds a new home.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Warden Marshall leads the charge on a poaching investigation. Warden Richards visits an allegedly illegal snake breeder. Wardens Gould and Hickerson try to save an injured pelican, while Warden Miller brings a caracara bird to rehab.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: With oyster season in full swing, Texas game wardens ensure everyone is following the rules on land and water. Hunters are investigated for trespassing on private property. The game wardens find an oyster boat deckhand with several warrants.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Across Texas, the wardens enforce the law during prime deer season. Bad weather conditions lead to a serious car wreck. A tipster reports an injured owl. A hunter harassment issue between neighbors is addressed. Illegal deer disposals are investigated.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A game warden has a run-in with an acrobatic squirrel. A Mexican shrimp boat may have an illegal catch. Fishing without a license leads to a trip to jail. A mystery UTV caught-on-tape has a surprising driver. Some kids are found in a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: The Game Wardens patrol the beach, lake and land, as summer is in full swing. Wardens educate a dog owner about leaving pets in the sun. An under-age drinker tells too many lies. Wardens inspect novice jet skiers on a busy recreational lake.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: As summer winds down in Texas, game wardens enforce the law. While patrolling the Rio Grande, Game Wardens Gould and Hickerson spot people attempting to enter the United States illegally, and Game Warden Inman responds to a call from a hunting club.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game wardens head to a home after getting a call about bucks fighting in Comal County. While patrolling the Brazos River, Kiel responds to a drowning in progress. A trespassing incident quickly turns into a drug case. Putnam hears shots fired nearby.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: During the holiday weekend a jet skier is reported missing, while another is caught without a life vest. Warden Kiel witnesses a fist fight during the fireworks, and warden Cummings handles underage drinkers.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Warden McGee rushes to a domestic altercation. Game Wardens Zuniga and Roel run into trespassers, while Provasnik inspects a potentially stolen jet ski. Game Wardens Richards and McGee team up on an investigation, and a baby squirrel is rescued.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: When a 12-foot gator manages to trap itself in wires, the wardens are determined to set it free. Warden Boone responds to a domestic dispute call, and a grey fox is found trapped in a residential area. Meanwhile, a darted goose chase ensues.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Texas Game Warden Gould responds to the call about an exotic red stag that was shot. In Hunt County, a plethora of warrants are dispersed for unpaid fishing violations, while Warden Flores and Williams join forces on the last day on patrol.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: In Texas, multiple boats are caught over-harvesting oysters and the wardens must handle an unruly captain. Then, when a fox is found dead on private property, an investigation begins to find the one responsible.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.sub-title: So Many Deer, Such Little Time
programme.desc: It's the start of hunting season, dubbed the 'Holy Day for Game Wardens.' Wardens Inman and Eddins investigate the illegal shooting of two deer. Then, Wardens Stapleton and McGee swap out bass fish in the Bois d'Arc Lake.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: A tense confrontation ensues when Wardens Scott and Gould respond to a call about an illegal deer hunting case. A pair of raccoons find their way to a gas station and must be trapped, and Warden Boone handles a disgruntled hunter.

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: During deer hunting season, Wardens Gould and Scott respond to a call about finding carcasses on private property. Then, stray bullets are shot into a horse owner's home, while hunters are questioned about hunting illegally.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: The hidden kingdom of microscopic alien organisms shapes the universe as much as galaxies, stars, and planets. New discoveries reveal how bacteria, viruses, and other alien micro-organisms built life on Earth and influence humanity's future in the cosmos.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: An explosion in the discovery of exoplanets is challenging everything we know about our universe; experts use cutting-edge astronomy to investigate these mysterious alien worlds and how they defy the laws of physics.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: White dwarfs are small, dead stars with a dangerous side, capable of exploding into supernovas and destroying planets; new research suggests these mysterious phenomena may be the key to understanding the universe itself.

programme.title: How the Universe Works
programme.desc: Our galaxy is full of stars ready to explode into supernovas, a stellar detonation powerful enough to destroy all life on Earth; it's an event that hasn't occurred in 400 years, and the search is on to locate which star may be next.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Villalobos is invited to attend their first Puppy Bowl, but which lucky pup will represent the rescue? New parolee Spencer joins Tania on his first rescue mission. And, a couple from Florida visits VRC in search a dog to help heal their broken hearts.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia races to rescue an emaciated puppy chained to an abandoned home. A couple visits VRC in hope of finding a younger sibling for their dog. And a Good Samaritan needs help rescuing a stray mama dog still bleeding three weeks after giving birth.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Moe and Lizzy rescue a sick, scared stray, but a diagnosis proves tricky. A friend of the rescue visits in hope of adopting a dog that has previously been overlooked.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A couple is torn between two dogs and can't decide which one to bring home. A terrified neighborhood stray in dire need of medical attention results in a difficult rescue for the VRC crew.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Villalobos is tested like never before when Tia and her crew are called upon to rescue a pack of wolf-dog hybrids abandoned by a backyard breeder. With law enforcement threatening to kill the dogs, the pressure is higher than ever.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Country Matt returns to help his brother, a new parolee, overcome his fear of dogs. Earl and Tia's daughter-in-law race to save a stray running loose in scorching temperatures. A couple of empty nesters visit VRC in search of a new friend.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: The police need Villalobos' help when a woman in the French Quarter is rushed to the hospital, leaving her dogs behind. A recent divorcee from Alabama visits the rescue to help fill the void in his home. Favourite dog, Rhino, faces a health crisis.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A family from Chicago comes to VRC, hoping to find their first dog. Out in Assumption Parish, Tia takes in a dog that has been attacked and is near death. Earl bonds with a young Villalobos employee and tries to mentor him on how to stay out of trouble.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Former adopters want to expand their family and adopt Caleb, a puppy that Tania rescued at birth, but Tia is unsure he will fit in with their other dog. When a local gets arrested, his dog is left behind and VRC is called in to help.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Villalobos is stretched thin when rescue calls come in one after another. A couple from rural Idaho visits the rescue, ready to open their hearts to a new friend. Mariah and parolee Leigh help a neighbor whose dog has become too much to handle.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A disabled veteran and his wife come to Villalobos to find a pair of dogs to help with his depression. Marcel and Mariah race to help a puppy in need.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A local woman calls Tia to surrender puppies that she can't care for anymore, but Tia is shocked by what she finds. Months after their house was destroyed in a fire, M2 and Kanani prepare to move into their new home.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Lizzy and Marcel team up to catch a stray pit bull on the streets near the rescue. A family to be visit Villalobos to adopt a dog that will complete the family unit. And after eight years of toil, Tia reveals the publication of her first book.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Villalobos faces one of their most challenging rescues when a house fire reveals a massive dog-hoarding situation. Two teachers fall in love with a deaf puppy they hope to give a forever home.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Mariah faces a challenging rescue when she realizes the dog in danger is deaf. Former adopters come back to Villalobos set on adopting a special needs dog. And the rescue struggles to track down a dog's owner because of outdated microchip information.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A senior dog is given a chance at a forever home. A rescue is complicated by the presence of two dogs. Later, the family discovers their personal dogs' origins when Tia surprises them with DNA test kits.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Villalobos is invited to participate in Dog Bowl, creating a chance for a handful of dogs to steal the spotlight. M2 helps a neglected dog left in horrible conditions. And a couple takes the first step towards becoming parents - adopting a Villalobos dog.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A potential adopter wants to give a forever home to a senior dog that has only known life in a kennel. M2 and Kanani are shocked when they find a box of puppies in a field. And, Matt and Earl head to the kitchen to cook up some fresh food for a sick dog.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: A potential best friend needs to pass a unique test before he can be adopted out. Parolee Jammall returns after a mysterious absence. A year after losing their house in a fire, M2 and Kanani do something special for the dog who saved their lives.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and Country Matt team up to rescue a reportedly aggressive dog. When a local student wants to adopt a dog that can join her on runs, Earl joins in the training regimen. And, parolee Jammall oversees the care of a dog with serious health issues.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia and her kids race to rescue a stray dog near a dangerous, busy highway. An adoption requires some temperament testing in an 18-wheel truck when a trucker wants to adopt a dog to join him on the road. And, a return adopter seeks out a senior dog.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Lizzy and Elise struggle to rescue a dehydrated dog in the blazing heat. An anxious, abandoned dog is moved to a new warehouse for dogs with special needs. And, Tia and the twins help a friend of the rescue find the perfect match.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.desc: Tia's son Kanani, and his fiancée M2, prepare for their wedding. Parolee Jammall finds an abandoned dog and asks Mariah for help rescuing it. Plus, a mother and son visit Villalobos hoping to find a new friend for their family dog.

programme.title: Pit Bulls & Parolees
programme.sub-title: The Dogs That Stole Our Hearts
programme.desc: Tia, her kids and the extended Villalobos family reveal the behind the scenes stories of the dogs that have stolen their hearts over the years.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When two young mothers are gunned down behind a crowded bar, Kenda has to first determine who was the intended target. But the case takes a bizarre turn when he learns of a third young woman who was recently murdered under eerily similar circumstances.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Officers find the lifeless body of furniture salesman behind the wheel. But Faast didn't die in the wreck - he was shot point-blank in the temple. Lt. Joe Kenda must track a killer whose promising career took a dark and deadly turn.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: The corpse of Jamie Foster is found hidden under a blanket. But when Lt. Joe Kenda digs deeper, he discovers that Foster's business put him in close quarters with a host of unsavory characters.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A war hero is beaten to death for no apparent reason. The crime scene offers few clues, but Lt Joe Kenda notices an unusual pattern in the victim's head wounds and enlists a team of engineers to help him identify the murder weapon and crack the case.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Officers discover the body of a young man they know all too well -- police informant Jimmie Stevenson. But Jimmy's loose lips made him a potential target for a laundry list of killers, and it's up to Lt. Joe Kenda to determine who pulled the trigger.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a mother is killed, Lt Joe Kenda wonders if it's a robbery gone wrong, until a slew of hateful messages surface. Then, patrols discover a body on a roadway after an evident hit-and-run, but the victim's true cause of death turns the case on its head.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A father is shot in the head just steps from a strip club. When Lt Joe Kenda traces the victim's last hours, the field of potential suspects grows, but no one will talk. The case is halted until Kenda uncovers a conspiracy organized by an unlikely gunman.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a squabble at a store turns violent, Raymond Archuleta steps in to help- only to be stabbed through the heart. Lt Joe Kenda must solve the case with little evidence besides a bloody bouquet, and a sketch of the mystery woman last seen holding them.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a pilot is found dead in her trailer, police are stumped; until Lt Joe Kenda finds a startling connection between the victim and her killer. Then, Kenda is called to a bloody shooting, only to discover that the murder victim is an old family friend.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: In his first case with the homicide unit, rookie burglary detective Joe Kenda volunteers to work a bloody multi-victim shooting deemed 'unsolvable' by the veterans. But has the ambitious young investigator bitten off more than he can chew?

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A popular army vet is found bleeding to death on the cold asphalt of a shadowy parking lot -his chest littered with too many knife wounds to count. A gruesome clue leads Kenda's team to an unlikely killer whose motive for murder is as heartless.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Kenda encounters one of the most horrendous crime scenes of his career, and he's lead to the most unexpected of killers. Then, a young soldier dies from a bullet to the neck from an apparent suicide, but the case soon spins in a whole new direction.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A young father-to-be is shot dead in broad daylight by a single bullet fired from afar. At the crime scene, Kenda recognizes the hallmark of a skilled sniper. But with zero evidence at his disposal, he'll rely on shoe leather detective work.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A seemingly random attack leaves Mary Moebus dead. But when Lt Joe Kenda uncovers a cache of new evidence, he realizes someone's been lying. Then, a cryptic note leads Kenda to a luxurious bachelor pad with a bedroom soaked in blood.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Neighbors are stunned when close friends Louis Matos and Colleen Johnson are gunned down in cold blood. The case kicks into high gear when Lt. Joe Kenda locates a panic-stricken eyewitness who played an unwitting role in the bloodbath.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A shooter on a rampage leaves a her 24 year old woman dead, and her two year-old child clinging to life. Investigators pursue a convoluted trail that ultimately leads Lt. Joe Kenda face to face with a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A 4th of July house party erupts in violence, and a young man is shot dead behind the wheel of a car. Lt. Joe Kenda must sort through a mountain of suspects, until a peculiar clue puts him hot on the heels of a self-styled gangster.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A decapitated body is discovered on some train tracks. To solve the case, Lt. Joe Kenda must listen to a voice from beyond the grave. Then, a young girl's body is found in basement. To find her killer, Kenda must expose a family secret.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A massive brawl erupts at a local bar ends with the shooting death of a young army soldier. To unravel the murder, Lt. Joe Kenda must infiltrate a revered military institution, and expose a dangerous vendetta.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When the lifeless body of Willie McCarty is found at the base of a staircase, neighbors direct Kenda to a mysterious truck spotted fleeing the scene. Then... Kenda must solve a bizarre case of poisoning at a busy downtown hospital.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: An ambush at a hamburger stand leaves a 16-year old dead. Lt. Joe Kenda must cut through rumor and innuendo in order to zero in on his prime suspect. But before he can catch the killer, a surprise witness blows the case wide open.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A romantic rendezvous is cut short by a violent home invasion, leaving young business owner Kelly Knudson bleeding to death on the floor. Lt Joe Kenda is short on leads, until he learns of an ex-roommate with an axe to grind.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a mysterious explosion rocks a sleepy suburb, it's up to Kenda to ID a pile of charred remains and find the killer who triggered the blast. Then...a young mother's murder leads the CSPD on a harrowing car chase that ends in a violent showdown.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When martial arts enthusiast Carl Hunt suffers a fatal knife wound to the gut, his friends and neighbors offer few viable leads. But Kenda discovers a cache of blood evidence that proves he's being lied to.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: Two grandparents are shot to death in their family home. Kenda's investigation kicks into high gear when his prime suspect flees for the Mexican border. Then...CSPD responders find a body so badly mutilated it turns the stomachs of seasoned officers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A young mother-to-be is shot and left for dead. To catch her assailant, Kenda must elicit a death-bed confession from the victim herself. Then...a corpse found floating in Monument Creek leads Kenda to a mysterious encampment on a nearby riverbank.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: When a spate of violent robberies spreads terror across the city, Kenda and the major crimes unit are called in to bring the masked gunman to justice. But when the brazen bandit strikes yet again, it looks as if Kenda's case is going down in flames.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: A jealous vendetta leaves a popular DJ dead, and his killer has dropped off the map. As a newly promoted supervisor, Sgt. Joe Kenda gambles his career on a risky strategy to bring his prime suspect to justice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Lt. Joe Kenda
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a five-alarm fire, first responders discover a lifeless body. When Kenda learns that the deadly blaze was no accident, he launches a manhunt for a pyromaniac with a fiery temper and a callous disregard for human life.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Full Throttle
programme.desc: Thirty-two of the fastest racers from around the country gather in OKC for the biggest street race of the year Cash Days. And, with $50,000 on the line, all the racers are prepared to push their cars to the limit to try and win it all.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After a difficult end to last season's list racing, the 405 comes together to reassess the rules and make a plan to move forward. They all agree to a list shakeup, which means everyone loses his spot on the list and has to race to earn a new place.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After an unfinished list shakeup Ryan and Chief finally line up to race off for #1. With the list complete, the 405 gets ready for their first list race of the season.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: It's a mad dash to make repairs as the top racers scramble to get ready to race. Meanwhile, Farmtruck and AZN head out of town to compete in a giant Daily Driver event.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The racers of the 405 struggle to get their cars ready after a tough few weeks of list racing, while Farmtruck and AZN head out of town for an Enduro Race. On race night, broken cars lock up the list and the racers have to come together to keep racing.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: With Florida racers coming to OKC, everyone in the 405 prepares for the first out of town race of the season. Farmtruck and AZN head out of town to get the Farmtruck ready for the race.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The top 3 rush to get their cars ready for race night, while Farmtruck and AZN line up against Murder Nova's dad. On race night, tensions boil over between Chuck and Shane while racers question each other when callouts aren't made.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Racers wonder who they can trust as they get ready to race, while the 405 is coming off a tense race night. Farmtruck and AZN find a fish in their callbox that may be more than they'd bargained for, and on race night, everyone’s on edge.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: When a group of Canadian racers decide to come to OKC, the 405 has to prepare to defend the U.S.A. The entire country on their backs on race night, the 405 takes big risks to show the Canadians that when it comes to street racing, America can't be beat.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After the race against Canada, Dave and Ryan struggle to get their cars switched back to big tires in time for list racing. Monza pulls his car off the list, which lets all the racers below him move up, and Reaper faces an unexpected contender.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: Thick as Rubber
programme.desc: When it's time to race, Shawn makes a stand and shows everyone else on the list what it means to race anytime.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Everyone in the 405 hurries to get the broken cars ready in time. Reaper fights to hold onto the 10 spot on race night. Chuck and Ryan try to fight game playing with games.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: It's the last list race of the season, and that means all the racers are getting ready for their last chance to move up the list. But, after a season of game playing and drama, tension has never been higher between the racers in the 405.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After a tough season of in-fighting and game playing, the racers of the 405 come together for a grudge race night, hoping to squash all the issues they have with each other.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN are hosting another daily driver race, and this time, they've invited racers from all over the country to come to the 405 and race for $25,000. All the racers get their cars ready and cruise out to the race spot for the big event.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: When Farmtruck finds a fleet of old cop cards, he and AZN decide to have a demolition derby, the likes of which 405 has never seen. Drivers from OKC, Texas, and Mississippi all get to work.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The racers are ready to do some serious damage at the Toilet Bowl 500. Chuck and Reaper seem like early favourites since they brought such serious cars, but wildcards like Tina, Ed, and Monza take a stand.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chief can't refuse an invitation from Boddie to go out West for a race. The OKC racer head out for an epic night of racing with more than $20,000 on the line.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings
programme.desc: Several weeks into the season, racers are struggling to keep their cars running at peak performance, working long days and long nights just to get race ready. Factor in extreme heat and a greasy surface, and someone's bound to hit a wall.

programme.desc: Ready for another season of list racing, the 405 is hoping to put the past behind them, come together and make street racing fun again. But on race night, the same old games threaten to break them apart before they start.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The 405 is in California taking on Boddie and his group of racers, but the night is off to a bumpy start. With both money and pride on the line, see if Oklahoma can come together to take home the big win.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN head to Kansas to fish with the new and improved Gonorail. Back in Oklahoma, Ryan and Dominator repair broken cars in preparation for list racing, but when a driver gets out of control, the evening is brought to an abrupt end.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Monza gets a chance to come for the list after his wreck, Shawn makes plans to get back into the top five, Farmtruck and AZN find a fun use for discarded airbags. Later, drivers make up for the lack of racing the previous week.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN invite all the 405 racers out to Willow Springs International Raceway for a road race competition. The racers have to pair up to compete in a time attack competition where the pair with the fastest combined times will take home $10,000.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN can't say no to an invitation to Summernats, an annual burnout competition in Australian. They ship a new truck to Australia, and get some help to get the truck ready in time to learn the true definition of burning rubber.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Ryan Martin looks over his car while Chief and Dave push each other in a competitive testing session, as they all get ready for another chance at number one. At race time, the racers fight to move up the list until broken cars slow everyone down.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Nearing the end of the list racing season, the racers make big decisions in a last ditch effort to movie up the list. On race night, untested cars mean big problems.

programme.desc: With the last list race of the season, the racers get their cars ready while Farmtruck and AZN fish out some fancy cars at cruise night. On race night, a costly mistake threatens to derail Chief.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Boosted holds a shootout for 10k in Ohio, while OKC prepares to take on Texas in a massive Cash Days showdown for $33,000.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings
programme.desc: Halfway through the season, competition heats up and strategy becomes more important than ever; Eric Bain pushes his car to its breaking point; Ryan Martin is back in first place but another racer may find a way to close the gap quickly.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings: Team Attacks
programme.desc: At the midpoint of the season, Team NOLA holds the most Team Attack wins and every other team is gunning for them. Scott Taylor sets his sights on back-to-back wins and Justin Swanstrom looks to claim a first victory for Team X.

programme.desc: OKC and Texas compete in an old school Cash Days race. Eight drivers from each state race for over $30,000 and the chance to prove that their state has the fastest racers in the country, but a sketchy road throws a wrench into the works for both sides.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: On the second night of Cash Days, 405 racers must match up and race, while still fighting to knock out the only remaining Texas driver. The sketchy road is still in play, and it becomes a tuner's game to see who can get down the street in one piece.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After dominating the track, the once-mighty kings of the street return to reclaim their roots. Feeling like drivers have gotten soft, Chief puts the 405 to test with the most important list shakeup ever. Chief and Murder Nova part ways.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chief, Dave, Ryan, Monza and Dominator battle for the number one spot as the list shakeup continues. Chief hopes to prove that his split with Shawn hasn't slowed him down. Ryan gets some advice from an unlikely source.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A horrifying crash brings a racer to terms that his racing days might be over. For the first time in list history, Chief and Shawn must find what it takes to win without the other's help.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A familiar face returns to the 405's list, bringing with him a new car with scary potential. Working on his own, Shawn tries to prove to his son he has what it takes to climb the ranks.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: After a series of bad passes, Shawn is determined to get the Murder Nova driving straight again. Monza challenges Ryan Martin for the number one spot on the top ten list. Farmtruck and AZN put the Jeeper Sleeper up against a tuned-up BMW.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: A horrific crash devastates the 405 as Kamikaze returns to defend The List against a new racer hoping to earn a spot. Shawn makes a big change in an attempt to turn things around and Ryan Martin wastes no time calling out Monza.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN bring back an epic third annual Daily Driver contest where racers show up with everything from a golf cart to a Corvette to compete for big stacks of cash.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The Daily Driver field is down to 18. With a new set of rules and a new road to race on, competition gets crazy. But only one driver will take home the cash prize.

programme.title: Street Outlaws: No Prep Kings
programme.sub-title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: In the back half of the season, Ryan Martin, Eric K and Robin Roberts lead the field in points. With a couple of good passes and support from a fellow teammate, Kye Kelley hopes to push his way into the top three.

programme.title: Crush With Lee & Tiffany
programme.desc: Lee and Tiffany meet up with good friends to try and chase after mule deer and antelope.

programme.title: Hank Parker's Outdoor Magazine

programme.title: Dances With Wolves
programme.desc: A Civil War soldier develops a relationship with a band of Lakota Indians. Attracted by the simplicity of their lifestyle, he chooses to leave his former life behind to be with them. Having observed him, they give the name Dances With Wolves. Soon he is a welcomed member of the tribe and falls in love with a white woman who has been raised in the tribe. Tragedy results when Union soldiers arrive with designs on the land.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge
programme.desc: Stuck-up figure skating whiz Kate Moseley (Moira Kelly) is denied a gold medal at the 1988 Olympics after a fall. As Kate drives off partner after partner, her coach, Anton (Roy Dotrice), must quickly find her a new one in order to be ready for the next Olympics. Enter arrogant former Olympic hockey player Doug Dorsey (D.B. Sweeney), who briefly encountered Kate years before. Reluctantly teaming up, Kate and Doug's icy rapport begins to thaw, resulting in a chemistry both in and out of the rink.

programme.title: Gamer
programme.desc: Each week Kable (Gerard Butler), a death-row inmate, battles his fellow prisoners in a violent online game called "Slayers," his every move controlled by a young gamer's remote device. To the players, Kable and the other inmates are just simulated characters. But, to a resistance group that opposes the game's inventor, Kable is a critical component of their plan to end the inventor's form of high-tech slavery.

programme.title: Milk
programme.desc: In 1972, Harvey Milk (Sean Penn) and his then-lover Scott Smith leave New York for San Francisco, with Milk determined to accomplish something meaningful in his life. Settling in the Castro District, he opens a camera shop and helps transform the area into a mecca for gays and lesbians. In 1977 he becomes the nation's first openly gay man elected to a notable public office when he wins a seat on the Board of Supervisors. The following year, Dan White (Josh Brolin) kills Milk in cold blood.

programme.title: Four Brothers

Rising musician Jack (Garrett Hedlund), former-Marine Angel (Tyrese Gibson), hotheaded hockey player Bobby (Mark Wahlberg) and settled-down husband and father Jeremiah (André Benjamin) go on the hunt for neighborhood criminal kingpin Victor Sweet (Chiwetel Ejiofor) while being trailed themselves by the local beat cops.

During World War I, two British soldiers -- Lance Cpl. Schofield and Lance Cpl. Blake -- receive seemingly impossible orders. In a race against time, they must cross over into enemy territory to deliver a message that could potentially save 1,600 of their fellow comrades -- including Blake's own brother.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: With Germany and the United Kingdom on the brink of war, an undercover British agent poses as a teacher at a finishing school for daughters of high-ranking Nazis.

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: Businessman Oskar Schindler (Liam Neeson) arrives in Krakow in 1939, ready to make his fortune from World War II, which has just started. After joining the Nazi party primarily for political expediency, he staffs his factory with Jewish workers for similarly pragmatic reasons. When the SS begins exterminating Jews in the Krakow ghetto, Schindler arranges to have his workers protected to keep his factory in operation, but soon realizes that in so doing, he is also saving innocent lives.

programme.title: Dexter: New Blood
programme.desc: Dexter fights for his life in the woods, leading to a confrontation in an abandoned summer camp; Harrison finds himself torn between two father figures who can lead him down two very different paths; Angela makes some disturbing discoveries (New!).

programme.title: Yellowjackets
programme.desc: As starvation looms, Taissa leads a last-ditch effort; amid felony schemes and all-night stakeouts, the Yellowjackets are forced to partake in small talk (New!).

programme.title: A Royal Night Out
programme.desc: As Europe celebrates V-E Day in 1945, teenage princesses Elizabeth (Sarah Gadon) and Margaret (Bel Powley) spend a wild evening in London.

programme.title: The Descendants
programme.desc: Native islander Matt King (George Clooney) lives with his family in Hawaii. Their world shatters when a tragic accident leaves his wife in a coma. Not only must Matt struggle with the stipulation in his wife's will that she be allowed to die with dignity, but he also faces pressure from relatives to sell their family's enormous land trust. Angry and terrified at the same time, Matt tries to be a good father to his young daughters, as they too try to cope with their mother's possible death.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
programme.desc: This sequel to the 2002 film returns to the Chicago barbershop owned by Calvin Palmer Jr. (Ice Cube). His employees -- Isaac (Troy Garity), Terri (Eve), Ricky (Michael Ealy), Dinka (Leonard Earl Howze) and Kenard -- have their own personal and workplace problems, and a new barbershop called Nappy Cutz has moved in across the street. As Calvin tries to change the character of his business, Nappy Cutz and gentrification become a threat to the surrounding community.

programme.title: Delivery Man
programme.desc: Amiable slacker David Wozniak (Vince Vaughn) drives a delivery truck for his family's company and is content with a life of mediocrity. However, when he learns that he is the biological father of more than 500 offspring and many of them are suing to learn his identity, he decides to hold himself accountable for his actions. He finds some of his progeny and becomes involved in their lives; however, when David's girlfriend announces her pregnancy, she keeps her expectations low.

programme.title: North Hollywood
programme.desc: A kid must decide between choosing the future his father wants and following his dream of becoming a pro skater.

programme.title: The Last Black Man in San Francisco
programme.desc: Jimmie and his best friend Mont try to reclaim the house built by Jimmie's grandfather, launching them on a poignant odyssey that connects them to their past, even as it tests their friendship and sense of belonging in the place they call home.

programme.title: The Descendants
programme.desc: Native islander Matt King (George Clooney) lives with his family in Hawaii. Their world shatters when a tragic accident leaves his wife in a coma. Not only must Matt struggle with the stipulation in his wife's will that she be allowed to die with dignity, but he also faces pressure from relatives to sell their family's enormous land trust. Angry and terrified at the same time, Matt tries to be a good father to his young daughters, as they too try to cope with their mother's possible death.

programme.title: The Change-Up
programme.desc: Once inseparable pals, Dave (Jason Bateman) and Mitch (Ryan Reynolds) have drifted apart over the years. Dave is an overworked lawyer and family man, while Mitch has thus far avoided most of the normal responsibilities of adulthood. Each is envious of the other's life, and following a drunken binge, the men awake to find they have somehow switched bodies. Dave and Mitch soon discover that things are not as rosy as they seemed and try to find a way to return their lives to normal.

programme.title: Wrong Turn
programme.desc: Despite warnings to stick to the Appalachian Trail, hikers stray off course and cross into land inhabited by a hidden community of mountain dwellers who use deadly means to protect their way of life. Suddenly under siege, the friends seem headed to the point of no return -- unless one man can reach them in time.

programme.title: Shameless Hall of Shame
programme.desc: When someone from Ian's past dies of COVID-19, Mickey has to accept the facts about Ian's past relationships, the dynamics of their relationship and the men they both married.

programme.title: Shameless Hall of Shame
programme.sub-title: Kev & V: God Doesn't Give With Both Hands
programme.desc: When Kev and V find out Gemma has been flunking zoom school, they're forced to face their fears of their own inadequacies as parents to help Gemma get back on track.

programme.title: Shameless Hall of Shame
programme.sub-title: Lip: Once Upon a Phillip Gallagher
programme.desc: When baby Fred comes down with a head cold, Lip tells him a story he's never heard before to try and help him get some rest.

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: In deep space, the crew of the commercial starship Nostromo is awakened from their cryo-sleep capsules halfway through their journey home to investigate a distress call from an alien vessel. The terror begins when the crew encounters a nest of eggs inside the alien ship. An organism from inside an egg leaps out and attaches itself to one of the crew, causing him to fall into a coma.

actor.role: Warrant Officer Lt. Ellen L. Ripley

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: If they hear you, they hunt you. A family must live in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, Evelyn and Lee are determined to find a way to protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: The First Purge
programme.desc: To push the crime rate below one percent for the rest of the year, the New Founding Fathers of America try a radical sociological experiment that allows citizens to vent their aggression for one night in an isolated community. The idea soon explodes across the nation when the violence of the oppressors meets the rage of the marginalized.

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: After fleeing from a stage show, the illusionists (Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson) known as the Four Horsemen find themselves in more trouble in Macau, China. Devious tech wizard Walter Mabry (Daniel Radcliffe) forces the infamous magicians to steal a powerful chip that can control all of the world's computers. Meanwhile, vengeful FBI agent Dylan Rhodes (Mark Ruffalo) hatches his own plot against Thaddeus Bradley (Morgan Freeman), the man he blames for the death of his father.

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: After fleeing from a stage show, the illusionists (Jesse Eisenberg, Woody Harrelson) known as the Four Horsemen find themselves in more trouble in Macau, China. Devious tech wizard Walter Mabry (Daniel Radcliffe) forces the infamous magicians to steal a powerful chip that can control all of the world's computers. Meanwhile, vengeful FBI agent Dylan Rhodes (Mark Ruffalo) hatches his own plot against Thaddeus Bradley (Morgan Freeman), the man he blames for the death of his father.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: As the Fourth of July nears, satellite engineer David Levinson (Jeff Goldblum) investigates a 3,000-mile-wide mother ship that's approaching Earth. Fortunately, 20 years earlier, nations across the world started to use recovered extraterrestrial technology to develop an immense defense program. When the alien invaders attack with unprecedented force, the U.S. president, teams of scientists and brave fighter pilots spring into action to save the planet from a seemingly invincible enemy.

programme.title: FXM Presents
programme.desc: An examination of the process of making movies follows a production from script to screen.

programme.title: The Fly
programme.desc: When scientist Andre Delambre (Al Hedison) tests his matter transporter on himself, an errant housefly makes its way into the transportation chamber, and things go horribly wrong. As a result, Delambre's head and arm are now that of the insect. Slowly losing himself to the fly, Delambre turns to his wife, Helene (Patricia Owens), for help. But when tragedy strikes, Delambre's brother (Vincent Price) and Inspector Charas (Herbert Marshall) are forced to pick up the investigation.

programme.title: Wizards
programme.desc: After the death of his mother, the evil mutant wizard Blackwolf (Steve Gravers) discovers some long-lost military technologies. Full of ego and ambition, Blackwolf claims his mother's throne, assembles an army and sets out to brainwash and conquer Earth. Meanwhile, Blackwolf's gentle twin brother, the bearded and sage Avatar (Bob Holt), calls upon his own magical abilities to foil Blackwolf's plans for world domination -- even if it means destroying his own flesh and blood.

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: Harriman Nelson (Walter Pidgeon) is the creator of a revolutionary nuclear submarine. After testing its capabilities in the Arctic Ocean, Nelson and the commanding officer (Robert Sterling) surface the vessel, only to discover the sky ablaze. Learning that the Van Allen radiation belt has caught fire, Nelson conceives a plan that could save the planet from destruction, but the U.N. shoots it down. Nelson is convinced it will work, but an onboard psychiatrist (Joan Fontaine) questions his sanity.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: New York Detective "Popeye" Doyle (Gene Hackman) and his partner (Roy Scheider) chase a French heroin smuggler.

programme.title: Quintet
programme.desc: A frozen wasteland is the scene of an unusual game of life or death where the victims fight to remain alive.

programme.title: Alien
programme.desc: In deep space, the crew of the commercial starship Nostromo is awakened from their cryo-sleep capsules halfway through their journey home to investigate a distress call from an alien vessel. The terror begins when the crew encounters a nest of eggs inside the alien ship. An organism from inside an egg leaps out and attaches itself to one of the crew, causing him to fall into a coma.

actor.role: Warrant Officer Lt. Ellen L. Ripley
